title: Higher U.S. interest rates raise value of USD

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to cause an increase in the international value of the United States dollar?

choices.label: Higher United States real interest rates
Expansionary monetary policy in the United States

content.answer: Higher United States real interest rates

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
